					Thread buttonTextUpdate = new Thread(new Runnable() {
						public void run() {
							changeText2("Time Left: 4");
							changeText2("Time Left: 3");
							changeText2("Time Left: 2");
							changeText2("Time Left: 1");
							changeText2("Time Left: 0");
							timeLeft = 0;
						}
					});
					buttonTextUpdate.start();
